00032 #include <fstream>
00033 #include <sstream>
00034 #include "ls_image.h"
00035 #include "bstream.h"
00036 #include "font_data.inc"

00038 using namespace std;
00039 
00040 const Font medium_bold_font = { 0, 128, 7, 13, medium_bold_font_data };
00041 const Font giant_font = { 0, 128, 9, 15, giant_font_data };
00042 
00043 void Palette::setPredefined (int num)
00044   {
00045   fv.clear(); cv.clear();
00046   switch(num)
00047     {
00048     case 0:
00049       add(0,Colour(0,0,0));
00050       add(1,Colour(1,1,1));
00051       break;
00052     case 1:
00053       add(0,Colour(0,0,0));
00054       add(0.4f,Colour(0,0,0.5f));
00055       add(0.75f,Colour(0,0.6f,1));
00056       add(1,Colour(1,1,1));
00057       break;
00058     case 4:
00059       add(0,Colour(0,0,.5f));
00060       add(0.15f,Colour(0,0,1));
00061       add(0.4f,Colour(0,1,1));
00062       add(0.7f,Colour(1,1,0));
00063       add(0.9f,Colour(1,.33f,0));
00064       add(1,Colour(.5f,0,0));
00065       break;
00066     default:
00067       planck_fail("Palette #"+dataToString(num)+" not yet supported.");
00068     }
00069   }
00070 
00071 void LS_Image::write_char (int xpos, int ypos, const Colour &col, char c,
00072   int scale)
00073   {
00074   planck_assert ((c>=font.offset) && (c<font.offset+font.num_chars),
00075     "write_char: character out of range");
00076   for (int i=0; i<font.xpix; ++i)
00077     for (int j=0; j<font.ypix; ++j)
00078       {
00079       int ofs = (c-font.offset)*font.xpix*font.ypix + j*font.xpix + i;
00080       if (font.data[ofs]!=' ')
00081         for (int m=0; m<scale; ++m)
00082           for (int n=0; n<scale; ++n)
00083             put_pixel(xpos+scale*i+m,ypos+scale*j+n,col);
00084       }
00085   }
00086 
00087 LS_Image::LS_Image ()
00088   : font(medium_bold_font) {}
00089 
00090 LS_Image::LS_Image (int xres, int yres)
00091   : font(medium_bold_font), pixel(xres,yres,Colour(0,0,0)) {}
00092 
00093 void LS_Image::annotate (int xpos, int ypos, const Colour &col,
00094   const string &text, int scale)
00095   {
00096   for (tsize m=0; m<text.length(); ++m)
00097     write_char(xpos+m*scale*font.xpix, ypos, col, text[m],scale);
00098   }
00099 
00100 void LS_Image::annotate_centered (int xpos, int ypos, const Colour &col,
00101   const string &text, int scale)
00102   {
00103   xpos-=(scale*text.length()*font.xpix)/2;
00104   ypos-=scale*font.ypix/2;
00105   annotate (xpos,ypos,col,text,scale);
00106   }
00107 
00108 void LS_Image::set_font (const Font &fnt)
00109   { font = fnt; }

00111 void LS_Image::write_TGA (const string &file) const
00112   {
00113   ofstream out(file.c_str(), ios_base::out | ios_base::binary);
00114   planck_assert(out, "could not create file '" + file + "'");
00115 
00116   tsize xres=pixel.size1(), yres=pixel.size2();
00117 
00118   bostream bo(out);
00119   const uint8 header[18] = { 0, 0, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0,
00120     uint8(xres%256), uint8(xres/256), uint8(yres%256), uint8(yres/256), 24, 32};
00121 
00122   bo.put (header, 18);
00123 
00124   for (tsize j=0; j<yres; ++j)
00125     for (tsize i=0; i<xres; ++i)
00126       bo << pixel[i][j].b << pixel[i][j].g << pixel[i][j].r;
00127   }
00128 
00129 namespace {
00130 
00131 void write_equal_range (const arr<Colour8> &px, tsize begin, tsize end,
00132   bostream &file)
00133   {
00134   chunkMaker cm (end-begin,128);
00135   uint64 cbeg, csz;
00136   while (cm.getNext(cbeg,csz))
00137     {
00138     file << uint8(csz-1+128);
00139     file << px[begin].b << px[begin].g << px[begin].r;
00140     }
00141   }
00142 void write_unequal_range (const arr<Colour8> &px, tsize begin, tsize end,
00143   bostream &file)
00144   {
00145   chunkMaker cm (end-begin,128);
00146   uint64 cbeg, csz;
00147   while (cm.getNext(cbeg,csz))
00148     {
00149     file << uint8(csz-1);
00150     for (tsize cnt=begin+cbeg; cnt< begin+cbeg+csz; ++cnt)
00151       file << px[cnt].b << px[cnt].g << px[cnt].r;
00152     }
00153   }
00154 
00155 } // unnamed namespace
00156 
00157 void LS_Image::write_TGA_rle(const string &file) const
00158   {
00159   ofstream out(file.c_str(), ios_base::out | ios_base::binary);
00160   planck_assert(out, "could not create file '" + file + "'");
00161 
00162   tsize xres=pixel.size1(), yres=pixel.size2();
00163 
00164   bostream bo(out);
00165   const uint8 header[18] = { 0, 0, 10, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0,
00166     xres%256, xres/256, yres%256, yres/256, 24, 32 };
00167 
00168   bo.put(header,18);
00169   for (tsize y=0; y<yres; ++y)
00170     {
00171     arr<Colour8> px(xres);
00172     for (tsize x=0; x<xres; ++x) px[x] = pixel[x][y];
00173     tsize xstart=0;
00174     while (xstart<xres)
00175       {
00176       if (xstart==xres-1)
00177         {
00178         write_unequal_range (px,xstart,xstart+1,bo);
00179         xstart=xres;
00180         }
00181       else
00182         {
00183         if (px[xstart+1]==px[xstart]) // range of equal pixels
00184           {
00185           tsize xend=xstart+2;
00186           while ((xend<xres) && (px[xend]==px[xstart])) ++xend;
00187           write_equal_range (px,xstart,xend,bo);
00188           xstart=xend;
00189           }
00190         else
00191           {
00192           tsize xend=xstart+2;
00193           while ((xend<xres) && (px[xend]!=px[xend-1])) ++xend;
00194           write_unequal_range (px,xstart,xend,bo);
00195           xstart=xend;
00196           }
00197         }
00198       }
00199     }
00200   }
00201 
00202 void LS_Image::write_PPM (const string &file) const
00203   {
00204   ofstream out(file.c_str(), ios_base::out | ios_base::binary);
00205   planck_assert(out, "could not create file '" + file + "'");
00206 
00207   tsize xres=pixel.size1(), yres=pixel.size2();
00208 
00209   bostream bo(out);
00210 
00211   ostringstream header;
00212   header << "P6" << endl << xres << endl << yres << endl << 255 << endl;
00213   string hdrdata = header.str();
00214   bo.put(hdrdata.c_str(),hdrdata.size());
00215 
00216   for (tsize j=0; j<yres; ++j)
00217     for (tsize i=0; i<xres; ++i)
00218       bo << pixel[i][j].r << pixel[i][j].g << pixel[i][j].b;
00219   }
